fields.Title of Presentation: Documenting refugee languages in the diaspora: The Boise Language Project
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: The 3rd International Conference on Language Documentation and Conservation (ICLDC)
fields.Description/Abstract: This paper describes the Boise Language Project – merging teaching, research, and outreach to the local refugee community. I discuss various issues encountered while recruiting participants, as well as share some success stories from the program.
